title: Nora
description: A cozy, minimal and elegant e-commerce store with comprehensive product management, user authentication, and payment processing.
shortDescription: A cozy, minimal and elegant store.
features: Responsive design for all device sizes
Product catalog with filtering and searching

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A modern and interactive portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase my projects, skills, and experiences as a software engineer.
shortDescription: My personal portfolio website to showcase my work and skills.

title: TaskMaster
description: A comprehensive task management application with features for team collaboration, deadline tracking, and progress visualization. Built with a microservices architecture.
shortDescription: A feature-rich task management application for teams.
features: Customizable task boards with Kanban view
Team member assignment and role management
Analytics dashboard with task completion metrics

title: SmartBudget
description: A financial management application that helps users track expenses, set budget goals, and visualize spending patterns with interactive charts and reports.
shortDescription: A personal finance tracking application with AI-powered insights.

title: Web Automation Framework
description: A robust framework for automating web tasks, testing, and data scraping. Built with Selenium and Python, it provides a simple API for complex browser interactions.
shortDescription: A powerful tool for automating repetitive web tasks.
